title: Alarm Clock Plus★
creator: Alarm Clock Plus / Binary Tactics, LLC.

extendedInfo.description: ALARM CLOCK PLUS IS THE MOST FULLY FEATURED AND MOST STABLE ANDROID ALARM CLOCK! FREE WITH NO LIMITATIONS!"â¦quite simply, the best alarm clock Iâve ever usedâincluding physical alarm clocks of the digital, analog, and wind-up varieties." -Lincoln Spector PCWorld MagazineAll options and features are configurable, spend time with Alarm Clock Plus and set it up exactly how you want it!Alarm Clock Plus features include:-Unlimited alarms-alarm clock volume independent of system, can even be set to sound while the phone is muted-auto snooze and auto dismiss for each alarm-ALARM CLOCK VOLUME FADE-IN. This feature will slowly increase the volume of the alarm.-NAP ALARM CLOCK allows you to quickly and easily create a new alarm for a given amount of time (like a timer).-MATH ALARM will require a math problem to be solved to dismiss or snooze alarm clock. There are multiple math difficulty levels, and the number of math problems required to be solved can be configured for both snooze and dismiss independently.-MUSIC ALARM clock lets you wake up to your favorite track or a random song from any artist, album, or playlist on your phone.-APP ALARM clock will launch an application when alarm sounds. For example you can use this to to launch pandora for your alarm.-FLASHLIGHT feature to brightly flash when alarm sounds.-Repeating alarms-One time skip for repeating alarms. Easily skip those alarms on a day off and sleep in without worrying about having to turn them back on again.-Shake your device to snooze or dismiss the alarm clock-Variable snooze time allows you to change the duration of the snooze after snooze button is pushed.-Define new alarm and nap alarm defaults.-Speaks time and/or weather before alarm sounds.-most settings are independent for each individual alarm-Set Alarm Clock Plus or any app to start upon plug-in-transparent clock widgets, multiple clock sizes, and nap alarm widgets-backup alarms and alarm clock plus configuration to sdcard-fully configurable desk clock display, or disable desk clock portion entirely, leaving a simple alarm clock.-Night display for desk clock.ADD ALARM CLOCK PLUS TO IGNORE LIST IN TASK KILLERS!KW: alarm, clock, alarm clock, alarm clock plus, alarm clock plusv2, alarmclock, alarmclockplus, acp, nap, alarms, clocks, alarm clocks, alarm-clock, alarm_clock, alarm.clock, alarm+clock, sleep, snooze ALARM CLOCK

reviews.title: Best Alarm I have found
reviews.comment: Super dependable and really easy to use.
reviews.author: Sarah Clotfelter

reviews.title: Awesome alarm! Love the giant snooze button
reviews.comment: The big  button is nice and I love waking up nice and easy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: This app is very complete has a nice interface , is very customizable ( even has a special feature for nap... Which comes in very handy) I recommend this app, won\'t disappoint :-)
reviews.author: Mar\303\255a Rosario L. Read Corbella

reviews.title: Easy to Use
reviews.comment: Super easy to use, but also very customizable. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Colten Anderson

reviews.title: Mr
reviews.comment: Good ,accurate and dependable.I love this appt and use it every day
reviews.author: Son Lu

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This is great, easy to use, and visually pleasing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ian Samsung s3
reviews.comment: Gets me up on time, lots of features. Only thing I would say is sometimes when you try to turn it off the alarm screen disappears making it hard to turn off.
reviews.author: Ian Duffield

reviews.title: Very nice alarm!
reviews.comment: You can set many different alarms, and name them individually. You can set to allow snooze button or not. It has a lot of good features and seems to be very reliable. And it\'s free! I\'m very glad I got it
reviews.author: Linda Brittain

reviews.title: Full-featured
reviews.comment: App activation not particularly useful, but other features work as expected... liked the ability to set different recurring alarms for different days of the week.
reviews.author: Andrew Brackbill

reviews.title: Needs More Volume
reviews.comment: I need something with more volume than the phones volume. However, this is a great clock with fun math features! Get your brain going early with math trivia for snooze.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: The app is generally good but communication with dev/s is bad. There are some minor issues but if you mail the dev, no reply. Nowdays that isn\'t the rule, its the bad exception.
reviews.author: Gus Hayabusa

reviews.title: User friendly
reviews.comment: This is a great asp that has so many useful options. Well done
reviews.author: Richard Northover

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I love this alarm. When u set it i can make the screen black and it will just display the time, nice and bright so if i get awake i can just look over for the time. Good app.
reviews.author: Megan Rennicks

reviews.title: Almost perfect...
reviews.comment: I love everything about this app, except it used to have a 1x1 size widget option for the analog clock, but it nolonger does on my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy to use and versatile.
reviews.comment: Love this application for both my morning alarm and quick timers.
reviews.author: Heather Annette Castner

reviews.title: Extremely helpful
reviews.comment: Extremely helpful app that has so many customizable features to create a perfect alarm system. Definitely worth the buy.
reviews.author: Deante Britton

reviews.title: All you need and more
reviews.comment: Very good app. I like the many options for setting the alarm + weather updates etc. Way better than my regular alarm next to my bed.
reviews.author: Herm Kars

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: I love this app. Works great on my phone and my Kindle Fire. My only issue is when trying to use Pandora as my wake up. It doesn\'t snooze and it\'s hard to get it to reset. Though, I assume it\'s a cross functionality issue or an issue with how Pandora plays in general and not one specific to this app.
reviews.author: Katie Belk

reviews.title: Nice fre app
reviews.comment: I use this almost everyday. I use the \"open an application\" option and have it open Pandora. It always turns on and is simple to use with lots of options. Snooze using the \"open application\" option doesn\'t work, but it works for a straight alarm.
reviews.author: Diane Hutchison

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great app, love the nap feature. This is my every day alarm. And I love being able to set a song as the ringtone!
reviews.author: A Google User
